trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.

Hides all items that are in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> does not have items in the overflow menu.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified item.

An object that is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified item.

Displays all items that are in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> does not have items in the overflow menu.

Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.

The state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ToolBar"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren"></xref>.

The collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.

The class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , value, or if the has items in the overflow menu and patternInterface is the value; otherwise, `null`.
